title: What is a timeline on how criminal investigation started? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mog, the mate of Nog, got hit in the head. Nog talked with a cave mate who acted as the wise man and know it all of the cave tribe, Jog. Jog looked at all the clubs of the other cave dwellers and found that Pog’s had Mog’s hair and some blood on it. Jog announced this and the rest of the tribe banned Pog. Next spring they found POg still frozen, dead, since he could nto find another cave tribe to take him in. So you have the timeline of the beginning of criminal-investigation, trial, decision and punishment.
